entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,473Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 315

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: intertwined, sewn together
entry.summary:
Author: artemissrx6

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,189Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: This time it was Jason Todd going after you, albeit less violent and more clumsy. It was even more awkward than his useless attempts from before. You're a paranoid creature, a true Gothamite, but even more than Bruce at times, which is an achievement he thinks you should be adding to your resume (you were not amused when he made that comment). Having your walls so high up he couldn't even see the top, he had to truly commit and do anything to get you to trust him. Opened up himself, tried to find common ground in terms of how you both grew up, made some progress, and then it blew up in his face when his stupid brain told him to try his hand at flirting — it earned him a blank stare and a prompt escape attempt. He stopped trying after that. While he was genuinely making an attempt at being honest, it of course did not entail making it known that he's Hood, because, yet again, he's a moron.

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,258Chapters: 1/18Kudos: 15

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.
